bill.summary:
6/18/2015--Introduced. Equal Justice for Our Military Act of 2015
Amends the federal judicial code to allow for review by writ of certiorari of certain cases denied relief or review by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces.
Declares that the time for application for such a writ shall be as prescribed by rules of the Supreme Court.
